events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer role, highlighting strong skills in backend development and cloud technologies.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords like software engineer and cloud developer experience.
A recruiter specialising in engineering positions has been assigned to manage the candidate's application and coordinate the next steps.
The candidate completed the initial screening call exhibiting strong communication skills and a thorough understanding of software development principles.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the initial screening feedback, expressing eagerness to proceed to the technical interview.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
